indexGlobs.description: Globs of what to index. By default will index all sv and svh files in the workspace.

indexingThreads.description: Thread count to use for indexing

parsingThreads.description: Thread count to use for parsing

buildPattern.description: Build file glob pattern, e.g. `builds/{}.f`. Used for selecting build files.

buildRelativePaths.description: Whether build files use paths relative to that file

wavesPattern.description: Waveform file glob to open given a build. Name and top variables can be passed with {name}, {top})

wcpCommand.description: Waveform viewer command ({} will be replaced with the WCP port), used for direct wcp connection with neovim and surfer.

inlayHints.description: Inline hints for things like ordered arguments, wildcard ports, and others

orderedInstanceNames.description: Hints for names of ordered ports and params

wildcardNames.description: Hints for port names in wildcard (.*) ports

funcArgNames.description: Function argument hints: 0=off, N=only calls with >=N args

macroArgNames.description: Macro argument hints: 0=off, N=only calls with >=N args
